table.name: gaiadr1.gaia_source
table.description: This table has an entry for every Gaia observed source as listed in the Main Database accumulating catalogue version from which the catalogue release has been generated. It contains the basic source parameters, that is only final data (no epoch data) and no spectra (neither final nor epoch).

column.name: pmra
column.description: Proper motion in right ascension direction

column.name: pmra_error
column.description: Standard error of proper motion in right ascension direction

column.name: pmdec_error
column.description: Standard error of proper motion in declination direction

column.name: astrometric_delta_q
column.description: Hipparcos/Gaia data discrepancy (Hipparcos subset of TGAS only)

column.name: astrometric_priors_used
column.description: Type of prior used in the astrometric solution

column.name: astrometric_weight_ac
column.description: Mean astrometric weight of the source

column.name: astrometric_weight_al
column.description: Mean astrometric weight of the source

column.name: dec_pmdec_corr
column.description: Correlation between declination and proper motion in declination

column.name: dec_pmra_corr
column.description: Correlation between declination and proper motion in right ascension

column.name: matched_observations
column.description: Amount of observations matched to this source

column.name: parallax_pmdec_corr
column.description: Correlation between parallax and proper motion in declination

column.name: parallax_pmra_corr
column.description: Correlation between parallax and proper motion in right ascension

column.name: phot_g_n_obs
column.description: Number of observations contributing to G photometry

column.name: pmra_pmdec_corr
column.description: Correlation between proper motion in right ascension and proper motion in declination

column.name: ra_dec_corr
column.description: Correlation between right ascension and declination

column.name: random_index
column.description: Random index used to select subsets

column.name: ra_parallax_corr
column.description: Correlation between right ascension and parallax

column.name: ra_pmdec_corr
column.description: Correlation between right ascension and proper motion in declination

column.name: ra_pmra_corr
column.description: Correlation between right ascension and proper motion in right ascension

column.name: scan_direction_mean_k1
column.description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_mean_k2
column.description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_mean_k3
column.description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_mean_k4
column.description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_strength_k1
column.description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_strength_k2
column.description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_strength_k3
column.description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_strength_k4
column.description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

table.name: gaiadr1.tgas_source
table.description: This table is a subset of GaiaSource comprising those stars in the Hipparcos and Tycho-2 Catalogues for which a full 5-parameter astrometric solution has been possible in Gaia Data Release 1. This is possible because the early Hipparcos epoch positions break some degeneracies due to the limited Gaia time coverage. This table contains a substantial fraction of the around 2.5 million stars in the Hipparcos and Tycho-2 catalogue. Many stars have been excluded due to several reasons, such as saturation, cross-match errors or bad astrometric solution.

column.name: pmra
column.description: Proper motion in right ascension direction

column.name: pmra_error
column.description: Standard error of proper motion in right ascension direction

column.name: pmdec_error
column.description: Standard error of proper motion in declination direction

column.name: astrometric_delta_q
column.description: Hipparcos/Gaia data discrepancy (Hipparcos subset of TGAS only)

column.name: astrometric_priors_used
column.description: Type of prior used in the astrometric solution

column.name: astrometric_weight_ac
column.description: Mean astrometric weight of the source

column.name: astrometric_weight_al
column.description: Mean astrometric weight of the source

column.name: dec_pmdec_corr
column.description: Correlation between declination and proper motion in declination

column.name: dec_pmra_corr
column.description: Correlation between declination and proper motion in right ascension

column.name: matched_observations
column.description: Amount of observations matched to this source

column.name: parallax_pmdec_corr
column.description: Correlation between parallax and proper motion in declination

column.name: parallax_pmra_corr
column.description: Correlation between parallax and proper motion in right ascension

column.name: phot_g_n_obs
column.description: Number of observations contributing to G photometry

column.name: pmra_pmdec_corr
column.description: Correlation between proper motion in right ascension and proper motion in declination

column.name: ra_dec_corr
column.description: Correlation between right ascension and declination

column.name: random_index
column.description: Random index used to select subsets

column.name: ra_parallax_corr
column.description: Correlation between right ascension and parallax

column.name: ra_pmdec_corr
column.description: Correlation between right ascension and proper motion in declination

column.name: ra_pmra_corr
column.description: Correlation between right ascension and proper motion in right ascension

column.name: scan_direction_mean_k1
column.description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_mean_k2
column.description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_mean_k3
column.description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_mean_k4
column.description: Mean position angle of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_strength_k1
column.description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_strength_k2
column.description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_strength_k3
column.description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

column.name: scan_direction_strength_k4
column.description: Degree of concentration of scan directions across the source

table.name: gaiadr1.cepheid
table.description: This table describes the Cepheid stars identified in table VariableSummary as classification="CEP". In the analyses only observations with rejectedByVariabilityProcessing=false are included, as found in table PhotVariableTimeSeriesGfov.

column.name: epoch_g
column.description: Epoch of the maximum of the light curve in the G band. (Barycentric JD in TCB - 2455197.5)

column.name: epoch_g_error
column.description: Uncertainty on the epoch parameter epochG

column.name: int_average_g
column.description: Intensity-averaged magnitude in the G band

column.name: mode_best_classification
column.description: Best mode classification estimate out of: {"FUNDAMENTAL", "FIRST_OVERTONE", "SECOND_OVERTONE", "UNDEFINED", "NOT_APPLICABLE"}

column.name: num_harmonics_for_p1
column.description: Number of harmonics used to model P1 of the light curve

column.name: p1
column.description: Period corresponding to the maximum power peak in the periodogram of G band time series

column.name: peak_to_peak_g
column.description: Peak-to-peak amplitude of the G band light curve

column.name: phi21_g
column.description: Fourier decomposition parameter phi21G: phi2 - 2*phi1 (for G band)

column.name: phi21_g_error
column.description: Uncertainty on the phi21G parameter: phi2 - 2*phi1 (for G band)

column.name: r21_g
column.description: Fourier decomposition parameter r21G: A2/A1 (for G band)

column.name: r21_g_error
column.description: Uncertainty on the r21G parameter: A2/A1 (for G band)

column.name: type2_best_sub_classification
column.description: Best subclassification estimate for typeBestClassification="T2CEP" out of: {"BL_HER", "W_VIR","RV_TAU"}

column.name: type_best_classification
column.description: Best type classification estimate out of: {"DCEP", "T2CEP", "ACEP"}

table.name: gaiadr1.rrlyrae
table.description: This table describes the RRLyrae stars identified in table VariableSummary as classification="RRLYR". In the analyses only observations with rejectedByVariabilityProcessing=false are included, as found in table PhotVariableTimeSeriesGfov.

column.name: best_classification
column.description: Best RR Lyrae classification estimate out of: {"RRC", "RRAB"}

column.name: epoch_g
column.description: Epoch of the maximum of the light curve in the G band. (Barycentric JD in TCB - 2455197.5)

column.name: epoch_g_error
column.description: Uncertainty on the epoch parameter epochG

column.name: int_average_g
column.description: Intensity-averaged magnitude in the G band

column.name: num_harmonics_for_p1
column.description: Number of harmonics used to model P1 of the light curve

column.name: p1
column.description: Period corresponding to the maximum power peak in the periodogram of G band time series

column.name: peak_to_peak_g
column.description: Peak-to-peak amplitude of the G band light curve

column.name: phi21_g
column.description: Fourier decomposition parameter phi21G: phi2 - 2*phi1 (for G band)

column.name: phi21_g_error
column.description: Uncertainty on the phi21G parameter: phi2 - 2*phi1 (for G band)

column.name: r21_g
column.description: Fourier decomposition parameter r21G: A2/A1 (for G band)

column.name: r21_g_error
column.description: Uncertainty on the r21G parameter: A2/A1 (for G band)

table.name: gaiadr1.phot_variable_time_series_gfov
table.description: Field-of-view time series of sources that have photVariableFlag = "VARIABLE" in the GaiaSource table.

column.name: observation_time
column.description: Barycentric light-travel time corrected timestamp for each FOV observation. (Barycentric JD in TCB - 2455197.5)

column.name: g_flux
column.description: G-band flux for each FOV observation

column.name: g_flux_error
column.description: Estimated G-band flux uncertainty for each FOV observation

column.name: g_magnitude
column.description: G-band magnitude for each FOV observation

column.name: rejected_by_variability_processing
column.description: True when this FOV observation was excluded from variability analyses

table.name: gaiadr1.phot_variable_time_series_gfov_statistical_parameters
table.description: Statistical parameters of field-of-view time series, only including observations with rejectedByVariabilityProcessing=false as found in table PhotVariableTimeSeriesGfov. Note that only sources are included that have photVariableFlag = "VARIABLE" in the GaiaSource table.

column.name: num_observations_processed
column.description: Number of processed G-band observations for variability analyses

column.name: mean_obs_time
column.description: Mean observation time (with respect to T0) of G-band time series

column.name: time_duration
column.description: Time duration of the G-band time series

column.name: range
column.description: Difference between the highest and lowest magnitude of the G-band time series

column.name: minimum
column.description: Minimum magnitude of the G-band time series

column.name: maximum
column.description: Maximum magnitude of the G-band time series

column.name: mean
column.description: Mean magnitude of the G-band time series

column.name: median
column.description: Median magnitude of the G-band time series

column.name: median_absolute_deviation
column.description: Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) of the G-band time series values

column.name: std_dev
column.description: Square root of the unweighted variance of the G-band time series values

column.name: skewness
column.description: Standardized unweighted skewness of the G-band time series values

column.name: kurtosis
column.description: Standardized unweighted kurtosis of the G-band time series values

column.name: abbe
column.description: Abbe value of the G-band time series values

column.name: iqr
column.description: Interquartile range of the time series values

table.name: gaiadr1.variable_summary
table.description: Table with variability summary of sources with photVariableFlag = "VARIABLE" in the GaiaSource table.

table.name: gaiadr1.aux_qso_icrf2_match
table.description: This table has an entry for all sources in the auxiliary QSO solution matched to the ICRF2 sources and passing all quality filters discussed in the corresponding documentation.

column.name: icrf2_match
column.description: ICRF2 designation of the source matched to this Gaia source

column.name: ra_dec_corr
column.description: Correlation between right ascension and declination

column.name: rot_flag
column.description: Flag indicating how this source was used to fix the orientation of the reference frame of the Gaia DR1 solution

column.name: astrometric_priors_used
column.description: Type of prior used in in the astrometric solution

schema.name: extcat
schema.description: Some well-known catalogs imported into this TAP service for crossmatch purpose.

table.name: hipparcos
table.description: Hipparcos, the New Reduction (van Leeuwen, 2007). (copy of the VizieR table I/311/hip2)

column.name: n_hip
column.description: Existence of a note in the first version of Hipparcos catalog on Duplicity (D), Photometry (P) or a General (G) note; letters W, X, Y, Z indicate notes on several topics (field H70 of the 1997 edition, Cat. I/239)

table.name: ppmxl
table.description: PPMXL is a catalog of positions, proper motions, 2MASS- and optical photometry of 900 million stars and galaxies, aiming to be complete down to about V=20 full-sky. It is the result of a re-reduction of USNO-B1 together with 2MASS to the ICRS as represented by PPMX. This service additionally provides improved proper motions computed according to :bibcode:`2016AJ....151...99V`.

column.name: ipix
column.description: Identifier (Q3C ipix of the USNO-B 1.0 object)

column.name: e_deepde
column.description: Mean error in Dec at mean epoch

column.name: b1mag
column.description: B mag from USNO-B, first epoch

column.name: b2mag
column.description: B mag from USNO-B, second epoch

column.name: r1mag
column.description: R mag from USNO-B, first epoch

column.name: r2mag
column.description: R mag from USNO-B, second epoch

column.name: e_raepra
column.description: Mean error in RA*cos(delta) at mean epoch

column.name: magsurveys
column.description: Surveys the USNO-B magnitudes are taken from

table.name: twomass
table.description: The 2MASS Point Source Catalogue, short a couple of exotic fields. We provide this data mainly for matching with other catalogs within our TAP service.

column.name: edge
column.description: flag indicating to which edges the edgeNS and edgeEW values refer

column.name: edgeew
column.description: Distance from the source to the nearest East or West scan edge

column.name: edgens
column.description: Distance from the source to the nearest North or South scan edge

column.name: errmaj
column.description: Major axis of position error ellipse

column.name: errmin
column.description: Minor axis of position error ellipse

column.name: errpa
column.description: Position angle of error ellipse major axis (E of N)

column.name: xscan
column.description: Distance of source from focal plane centerline

column.name: id
column.description: Concatenation of tyc1, tyc2 and tyc3.

column.name: e_pmde
column.description: s.e. of Dec at mean epoch

schema.name: TAP_SCHEMA
schema.description: Set of tables listing and describing the schemas, tables and columns published in this TAP service.

table.name: TAP_SCHEMA.schemas
table.description: List of schemas published in this TAP service.

column.name: utype
column.description: UTYPE if schema corresponds to a data model

table.name: TAP_SCHEMA.tables
table.description: List of tables published in this TAP service.

column.name: table_index
column.description: this index is used to recommend table ordering for clients

column.name: table_name
column.description: table name as it should be used in queries

column.name: utype
column.description: UTYPE if table corresponds to a data model

column.name: row_count
column.description: Number of rows inside this table.

table.name: TAP_SCHEMA.columns
table.description: List of columns of all tables listed in TAP_SCHEMA.TABLES and published in this TAP service.

column.name: column_index
column.description: this index is used to recommend column ordering for clients

column.name: "size"
column.description: same as "arraysize" but kept for backward compatibility only

column.name: indexed
column.description: an indexed column; 1 means true, 0 means false

column.name: principal
column.description: a principal column; 1 means true, 0 means false

column.name: std
column.description: a standard column; 1 means true, 0 means false

column.name: min_value
column.description: Minimum value of this column in the whole table.

column.name: max_value
column.description: Maximum value of this column in the whole table.

column.name: mean
column.description: Mean value of this column in the whole table.

column.name: std_dev
column.description: Standard deviation of this column in the whole table.

column.name: q1
column.description: First quartile of this column in the whole table.

column.name: median
column.description: Median (or 2nd quartile) of this column in the whole table.

column.name: q3
column.description: Third quartile of this column in the whole table.

column.name: filling
column.description: Number of valid values (neither NaN nor NULL) for this column in the whole table.

column.name: coosys_id
column.description: ID of the used coordinate systems (if any).

foreignKey.description: Coordinate system specification for a column containing a coordinate.

table.name: TAP_SCHEMA.keys
table.description: List all foreign keys but provides just the tables linked by the foreign key. To know which columns of these tables are linked, see in TAP_SCHEMA.key_columns using the key_id.

table.name: TAP_SCHEMA.coosys
table.description: List of coordinate systems of coordinate columns published in this TAP service.

column.name: id
column.description: ID of the coordinate system definition as it must be in the VOTable.

column.name: system
column.description: The coordinate system among: ICRS, eq_FK5, eq_FK4, ecl_FK4, ecl_FK5, galactic, supergalactic, xy, barycentric, geo_app.

column.name: equinox
column.description: Required to fix the equatorial or ecliptic systems (as e.g. J2000 as the default for eq_FK5 or B1950 as the default for eq_FK4).

table.name: TAP_SCHEMA.key_columns
table.description: List all foreign keys but provides just the columns linked by the foreign key. To know the table of these columns, see in TAP_SCHEMA.keys using the key_id.

column.name: from_column
column.description: key column name in the from_table

column.name: target_column
column.description: key column name in the target_table

table.name: ivoa.ObsCore
table.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] ObsCore 1.1. On this TAP service, this table lists only TimeSeries corresponding to Gaia-DR1's Cepheids and RR-Lyrae sources. EXPERIMENTAL because metadata and format of the TimeSeries are still work in-progress.

column.name: facility_name
column.description: The observatory or facility used to collect the data.

column.name: instrument_name
column.description: The name of the instrument used for the observation.

column.name: obs_id
column.description: Internal ID given by the ObsTAP service.

column.name: dataproduct_type
column.description: Data product (file content) primary type. Possible values: image, cube, spectrum, sed, timeseries, visibility, event, measurements.

column.name: s_ra
column.description: Central Spatial Position in ICRS Right ascension.

column.name: s_dec
column.description: Central Spatial Position in ICRS Declination.

column.name: s_fov
column.description: Estimated size of the covered region as the diameter of a containing circle.

column.name: s_region
column.description: Sky region covered by the data product (expressed in ICRS frame).

column.name: s_resolution
column.description: Spatial resolution of data as FWHM of PSF.

column.name: s_xel1
column.description: Number of elements along the first coordinate of the spatial axis.

column.name: s_xel2
column.description: Number of elements along the second coordinate of the spatial axis.

column.name: t_resolution
column.description: Minimal interpretable interval between two points along the time axis.

column.name: t_xel
column.description: Number of elements along the time axis.

column.name: em_res_power
column.description: Value of the resolving power along the spectral axis. (R).

column.name: em_xel
column.description: Number of elements along the spectral axis.

column.name: pol_xel
column.description: Number of elements along the polarization axis.

column.name: obs_publisher_did
column.description: ID for the Dataset given by the publisher.

column.name: calib_level
column.description: Calibration level of the observation. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4.
